data.name: chombo-discharge
data.description: Beta release of chombo-discharge, a research code for low-temperature plasma which uses a Cartesian cut-cell formalism.

evidence: "This is ``chombo-discharge``, a multiphysics code which uses ``Chombo`` for discharge simulations with adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) on embedded boundary grids."
"``chombo-discharge`` is aimed at performant electric discharge simulations (e.g., Townsend discharges, streamer discharges, sprites, etc.), and scales to tens of thousands of CPU cores."

Installation instructions and contribution workflow are described in terms of cloning and working with the GitHub repository (e.g., branching, committing, pushing, and pull requests), indicating distribution via the source repository.
